authorized-role.description: The role that has access to trusted commands.

autosave-interval.description: The rate which gameData is saved and stored (in minutes). useful for data loss prevention.

quest-interval.description: The rate which available quests are refreshed (in minutes)

auto-start.description: Automatically starts the game on server/plugin-start

clear-gamedata.description: !!!DANGEROUS!!! Resets all gamedata upon restart, used for testing purposes. Enabling this option will make a lot of players angry in a live session.
